thread.title: Boston CBS Station Adds Weekend Morning Anchor
thread.title_full: Boston CBS Station Adds Weekend Morning Anchor

author: Kevin Eck
title: Boston CBS Station Adds Weekend Morning Anchor

organizations.name: adweek all rights reserved boston cbs station

text:
© 2017 Adweek All Rights Reserved Boston CBS Station Adds Weekend Morning Anchor Advertisement Comment 
Anaridis Rodriguez is joining Boston CBS-owned station WBZ as weekend morning anchor. 
“Anaridis will be a fantastic addition to our outstanding team of journalists,” said news director Johnny Green . “We are thrilled to have her join us and look forward to having her contribute to our signature segments and continue our commitment to the local community.” 
Rodriguez comes from The Weather Channel where she was an anchor and network correspondent. Before that, she was a weekend anchor and reporter at WWLP in Springfield, Mass.
